channel.title: ANSWER: to npc shops wont trade
channel.description:
If you have the same problem i did, where the shops wouldnt trade i can Help you XD
(I only tried it on my server, which is hustla source)
But what you have to do is make sure the shops are in the same position they were on the list as when you first got the source.
FOR EXAMPLE: 1. spawn = 494 2811 3443 0 0 0 0 0 1 Catherbay East Bank Male Banker3 2. spawn = 495 2810 3443 0 0 0 0 0 1 Catherbay East Bank Female Banker 3. spawn = 494 2809 3443 0 0 0 0 0 1 Catherbay East Bank Male Banker 4. spawn = 494 2807 3443 0 0 0 0 0 1 Catherbay East Bank Male Banker 5. spawn = 527 2804 3432 0 0 0 0 0 2 Catherbay General Store Shop Keeper
You have to make sure they always are in the same spot. like you cant delete 4. and the move 5 up...it has to be in the same line

item.title: ANSWER: to npc shops wont trade
item.dc:creator: @almost_died almost died
item.description:
@almost_died wrote:

[quote=“recker450, post:2, topic:224658”]did u add em in client.java?
npchandler is optional if u want them to talk[/quote]

Im talking about the autospawn.cfg

Read full topic

item.title: ANSWER: to npc shops wont trade
item.dc:creator: @almost_died almost died
item.description:
@almost_died wrote:

If you have the same problem i did, where the shops wouldnt trade i can Help you XD

(I only tried it on my server, which is hustla source)

But what you have to do is make sure the shops are in the same position they were on the list as when you first got the source.

FOR EXAMPLE:

  1. spawn = 494 2811 3443 0 0 0 0 0 1 Catherbay East Bank Male Banker3
  2. spawn = 495 2810 3443 0 0 0 0 0 1 Catherbay East Bank Female Banker
  3. spawn = 494 2809 3443 0 0 0 0 0 1 Catherbay East Bank Male Banker
  4. spawn = 494 2807 3443 0 0 0 0 0 1 Catherbay East Bank Male Banker
  5. spawn = 527 2804 3432 0 0 0 0 0 2 Catherbay General Store Shop Keeper

You have to make sure they always are in the same spot. like you cant delete 4. and the move 5 up…it has to be in the same line
